steps.name: the user is on the main screen

elements.name: User successfully creates an account then login and verify the user loggedIn details

steps.name: the user is navigate to create account page
the user enters valid "John" as first name
the user enters valid "Doe" as last name
the user enters valid "Secure@123" as password
the user clicks on the create account button
the user should be successfully registered
the user clicks on the login button
the user enters the registered email
the user enters the valid password "Secure@123"
the user clicks on the login button
the user should be successfully logged in
the user profile should display correct first name, last name and email
the user clicks on the logout button
the user should be redirected to the login screen

name: End to End Functionality - Happy Flow
